History
-------

0.2.1 (2018-10-20)
==================

* Fix edge cases with multibase and multihash decoding
* Added hypothesis tests while verifying CIDs

0.1.5 (2018-10-12)
==================

* Handle the case where an incorrect base58 encoded value is provided to `make_cid`


0.1.0 (2017-09-05)
==================

* First release on PyPI.
